name: Triamid Dune Sphynx
text:
2 Level 3 Rock Monsters 
 This card gains 500 ATK and DEF for each Field Spell Card with a different name in your GY. Once per Chain (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 Field Spell Card from your field or GY and target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy that target, also for the rest of the turn, you cannot banish Field Spell Cards with that same name used to activate this effect of "Triamid Dune Sphynx". You can detach 1 Xyz material from this card: target 1 "Triamid" monster you control; this turn that card is unaffected by other monsters effects.
